title: Unable to reinstall.
body: So i ran into some issue where it got stuck in a endless loop of. Error the game will restore a previous patch to reinstall the patch. or something along those lines. so i uninstalled and deleted all associated files. reinstalled and i still get a error as soon as i try to reinstall. https://justpaste.it/19zev all the logs are there.

replies.body: I have a similar issue. The client installer claims to be search for a file LoL.NA.MSI in the folder, I can see it in the folder only when the installer is running, but the file doesn't appear to have the .MSI extension. Even creating a new administrator account on my computer doesn't solve it, definitely a Riot bug from what I can tell. Apparently uninstalling was a mistake, but I can't undo it now.

Is the Hextech Repair Tool supposed to automatically close itself its gets as far as gathering logs but that's it. Chromium Embedded Framework CEF Client Application has stopped working whenever i run it as an admin.

That endless loop you were caught in might have been happening if the patch wasn't able to be applied correctly due to some already damaged or missing game files. Now that you're trying to reinstall, there's a decent chance that those damaged files are still hanging around and causing these issues with the install. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on so that you can be sure that you get a full clean install.

Hi, I tried this and I get "Install Path Not Found" LoL is not installed in the default location..."

Seems like I can't even download the client..

I've been playing all week and I'm even using a different pc with the exact same issue I've been troubleshooting for hours please help me.
